did.unittitle: University of Kentucky. College of Engineering. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Accreditation Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Kentucky. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

did.abstract: The University of Kentucky. College of Engineering. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Accreditation Records (dated 1992-2016; 1 cubic foot and 150 Megabytes; 1 record storage carton and 230 files) primarily comprise self-study reports and interim reports prepared by the Departments of Electrical Engineering and Computer Engineering in the University of Kentucky College of Engineering for accreditation by the Engineering Accreditation Commission (EAC) of the Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology (ABET), 1993-2016.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2024ua025 : [identification of item], University of Kentucky. College of Engineering. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Accreditation Records, 1992-2016, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The University of Kentucky. College of Engineering. Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Accreditation Records (dated 1992-2016; 1 cubic foot and 150 Megabytes; 1 record storage carton and 230 files) primarily comprise self-study reports and interim reports prepared by the Departments of Electrical Engineering and Computer Engineering in the University of Kentucky College of Engineering for accreditation by the Engineering Accreditation Commission (EAC) of the Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology (ABET), 1993-2016. Also includes EAC draft and final reaccredidation statement (1993); Southern Association of Colleges and Schools (SACS) Visiting Committtee Report on accredidation and University Kentucky responses (1992); syllabi for classes taught by Paul A. Dolloff, EE 531 (Alternative and Renewable Energy Systems, spring 2010) and EE 539 (Electric Power Distribution, spring 2009); and Individual Research Reports (by individual students), Critical Design Reports (CDR), Preliminary Design Reviews (PDR), and Specification and Requirement Reports for 11 engineering projects: Controlled Descent Balloon Recovery Automated; Battery Management Power Tracking (BMPT) System for UK Solar Car; AUVSI Foundation RoboBoat Competition; Collegiate Aerial Robotics Demonstration (CARD); Fluid Media Power Generation (FMPG); Gray Construction Project; IEEE Hardware Competition; Interactive and Integrated Power Control System (IIPCS); Net-Zero Triangle Fraternity House; Soccer Robot; and the X-Stream Team. Includes born-digital documents in Microsoft Word and PDF formats.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the University of Kentucky. The University of Kentucky holds the copyright for materials created in the course of business by University of Kentucky employees. Copyright for all other materials has not been assigned to the University of Kentucky. For information about permission to reproduce or publish, please contact the Special Collections Research Center.

did.unittitle: Individual Research Reports (by students), Critical Design Reports (CDRs), Preliminary Design Reviews (PDRs), and Specification and Requirement Reports for 12 projects

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes these 11 projects: Controlled Descent Balloon Recovery Automated by Kentucky Research; Battery Management Power Tracking (BMPT) System for UK Solar Car; AUVSI Foundation RoboBoat Competition; Collegiate Aerial Robotics Demonstration (CARD); Fluid Media Power Generation (FMPG); Gray Construction Project; IEEE Hardware Competition; Interactive and Integrated Power Control System (IIPCS); Net-Zero Triangle Fraternity House; Soccer Robot; and X-Stream Team.
